# **`MetaStat`**

## Installation

You can install the development version of `MetaStats` like so:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages('pak')
pak::pkg_install("FrancoMSuarez/MetaStat")
```

## Run

You can launch the application by running:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
MetaStats::run_app()
```
